revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tecom |model=IG6600 |revision= |fcc_date=07/11/2010 |availability=now |type=wireless router,access point,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=D6XIG6600 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6369;BCM6369KPBG; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Mindspeed |cpu2_model=Comcerto 300;M82351-12; |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43222 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54610 |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=VoIP, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin1234 |default_pass=123456 |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Home Intelligent Gateway}} :[http://www.tecom.com.tw/en/product/ig6600/ Product page]
*Intelligent Gateway (IG6600) + IP Phone (IP2061) A Custom-design Integrated Voice/Data Business System for VSE and SME
*P/N: 261-451313R :[[Broadcom]]/[[Mindspeed]] CPU. The processor is definately ARM based.
The default SSID may be IG6600 (it's the sample value in the FCC manual).. :there is one entry for this SSID in WiGLE with OUI 00:19:15 (Tecom). The default credentials are from the FCC submitted manual and may not be accurate.
===Hardware=== *Processors: [[Broadcom]] BCM6369 + [[Mindspeed]] M82351 (VoIP) *2x Ethernet Ports (1x 10/100/1000 to WAN, 1x 10/100 to LAN) *1x USB port (Host for Printer Sever and External Memory) *1x FXS Ports (Fax/FXO to FXS), 6x FXO Ports (PSTN Lines) *1x WPS button, Reset button, Power plug
===See also=== *[[Tecom T5000]] - Home Security System â€¢ [http://www.tecom.com.tw/en/product/t-5000/ PPage] *[[Netgear EVG2000]] - Home Network Gateway *[[Telsey CPL7]] - Home Network Gateway
